body.name: kasorey Laptop Screen Extender, 14'' FHD 1080P IPS Dual Laptop Monitor Extender Display, HDMI/USB-A/USB-C Plug-Play Portable Monitor Attachment for Windows, Chrome, Mac and Switch
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 12 mins
features: 🌈【Perfect user experience】 Kasorey dual display monitor offers extended and mirrored screen functions for efficient multitasking. With extended mode, users can display multiple tasks simultaneously, enhancing work efficiency. It suits gamers, programmers, designers, and professionals who handle multiple tasks. In mirrored mode, screen content is synchronized in real-time for easy sharing and demonstration.

💻【1080P FHD IPS Monitor】 Kasorey laptop monitor extender features a brand new 14" FHD IPS screen, which enhances the adjustable brightness experience beyond the standard 1080P HD display, It offers a wider range of brightness adjustments, allowing users to customize their viewing experience to their preference. The screen also incorporates anti-glare technology, providing excellent protection for eyes by reducing glare and eyestrain.

❤️【Ultra-thin design + strong stability】 Featuring a ultra-thin 0.24-inch screen and a 0.3-inch slim frame design, this product significantly reduces weight. The frame is equipped with rubber pads on both sides to securely hold your laptop while providing excellent protection. In addition, it comes with an adjustable stand that offers enhanced stability for your convenience.

🎁【Wide compatibility + 365-day after-sales guarantee】 The Kasorey external monitor is plug-and-play, requiring no driver installation. It is compatible with Mac, Windows, Chrome, Linux, TYPE-C smartphones, Switch, M1/M2, M1 Pro/Max, M2Pro/Max, Xbox, and PS4. Crafted with high-quality materials, it has obtained FCC, CE, and RoHS certifications. It comes with a 365-day replacement warranty and 24-hour customer service response time.

🔶【Easy to Use】 Kasorey portable monitors are equipped with two full-featured TYPE-C ports and one HDMI-to-USB-C port, allowing easy access to your favorite devices with just one TYPE-C cable. Alternatively, you can use an HDMI cable for signal transmission and a USB-A cable for power supply, requiring only two cables for connection. The package includes all the necessary cables for connectivity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kasorey laptop screen extender - a portable monitor for laptops that is plug-and-play, efficient, and definitely worth having. No need to install any drivers, it can be directly connected and used with "full-featured USB-C port" or "HDMI port + USB-A port".Extend your laptop screen without the need for multiple task windows switching back and forth, making multitasking even simpler.14-inch FHD 1080P screen, perfect for dual monitor attachment to a laptop.0.24-inch ultra-thin screen, built-in speakers, and comes with a fixed stand, meeting all needs.

Connection Method ("TYPE-C" or "HDMI + USB-A“) Quick tip: 1. When using an HDMI cable + USB-A cable, please make sure to connect the HDMI cable to the port labeled "HDMI" on the back of the product. 2. If you are unable to achieve a successful connection using a Type-C cable, it may be because your USB-C port is not a fully functional USB-C port. In this case, please choose the connection method using an HDMI cable + USB-A cable.
Travel monitor for laptop: No matter where and when, plug and play, instantly expand your laptop to a second screen.

Common troubleshooting solutions for Kasorey laptop screen extender Q: Why does the screen flicker or not light up after a proper connection? A: It could be that your laptop's battery is low or the power supply from the laptop's port is insufficient. Please use an external power source providing 5V/2A and connect it to the Type-C port labeled on the back of the connecting product to power the screen. Q: Why is the screen not displaying after connecting with a Type-C cable? A: First, you need to confirm whether the USB-C port on your laptop is a full-featured USB-C port. If it is not, please use an HDMI cable and a USB-A to USB-C cable for the connection (all necessary cables are included in the package). If it is a full-featured port, the issue might be insufficient power supply to the screen. You can use a USB-A to USB-C cable to provide power to the screen. Q: If the charging port of your computer is occupied, how can you power your laptop? A: You can use an external power supply with 5V/2A and plug it into the Type-C port labeled on the back of the device to power your laptop. Q: Why is the screen not displaying when using an HDMI cable and USB-A cable for connection? A: Please make sure that your HDMI cable is connected to the port labeled "HDMI" on the back of the product, not the port labeled "Type-C".

Common troubleshooting solutions for Kasorey laptop screen extender Q: Why does the screen flicker or not light up after a proper connection? A: It could be that your laptop's battery is low or the power supply from the laptop's port is insufficient. Please use an external power source providing 5V/2A and connect it to the Type-C port labeled on the back of the connecting product to power the screen. Q: Why is the screen not displaying after connecting with a Type-C cable? A: First, you need to confirm whether the USB-C port on your laptop is a full-featured USB-C port. If it is not, please use an HDMI cable and a USB-A to USB-C cable for the connection (all necessary cables are included in the package). If it is a full-featured port, the issue might be insufficient power supply to the screen. You can use a USB-A to USB-C cable to provide power to the screen. Q: If the charging port of your computer is occupied, how can you power your laptop? A: You can use an external power supply with 5V/2A and plug it into the Type-C port labeled on the back of the device to power your laptop. Q: Why is the screen not displaying when using an HDMI cable and USB-A cable for connection? A: Please make sure that your HDMI cable is connected to the port labeled "HDMI" on the back of the product, not the port labeled "Type-C".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great second monitor
reviews.reviewText: The screen was packaged very well and it was really easy to install… the quality of the screen is good! It came with a few cables for options which I really liked. It also comes with a carry case which is really convenient for traveling. The second screen works like a charm. Love having extra screen space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must-have for any laptop user!
reviews.reviewText: The super slim and lightweight design makes it effortless to pack up and take this monitor anywhere. Despite its compact form, the display quality is excellent. Images and videos appear crisp and vivid on the bright IPS screen.Setting it up could not be simpler - just connect with the Type-C, USB-C or Mini HDMI cable (all included) and it's plug-and-play ready with no software or anything needed. Worked instantly with my Surface.The smart flip cover is genius - it converts to a stand to prop up the monitor at different angles. Very versatile for use whether you're working at a desk or lounging on the couch.For anyone looking to expand their laptop's screen real estate for improved productivity, this portable monitor is a must-have accessory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for laptop dual screen
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My job requires me to travel a lot, and I really like to have an additional monitor with my laptop because it helps me multitask and increase productivity. I ordered this 14" 1080P FHD IPS laptop monitor extender made by Kasorey. In the box, it comes with three different types of cables: USB-C to USB-C, HDMI, and USB-A to USB-C, so you can use different types of cables to connect the monitor to different types of laptops. Last in the box is the monitor with the mount, a nice case with two handles. The monitor is very compact to fit in the case, so you can take it with you on the go. Both sides of the monitor mount are spring-loaded, and it will just clamp it onto the existing laptop screen. On the back of the monitor mount, there is a nice little kickstand to help support the extra weight the monitor added. On the back of the monitor, there are 2 UCB-C ports and 1 HDMI port. I connected the monitor using two cables, HDMI and USB A to USB C. It is plug & play and it is ready to go. Next, you can set up how you want the dual monitor to function as a mirror or extended screen within the Windows OS on your laptop. This monitor has a 1080p resolution, 300 nits of brightness, and a 60 Hz refresh rate. The picture is crisp and clear, and it is very bright. Overall, it is a very nice monitor and very easy to install. If you are in the market to get a dual-screen laptop, this one is worth checking out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It looks like a tablet, it is not heavy and easy to handle, it is ideal when working since you can share screens and have a broader view. The material looks like it is made of good material. Screen resolution is acceptable. It’s good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is almost perfect for my MacBook Air. I would like if it was 13 inch but 12 in gets the job done as well. I love the fact that it’s so lightweight! I’ve bought two others from recently which were of bigger size and unfortunately the weight made me decide to return them. This one is perfect for on the go. Setup is quite easy as well; just plug in both ends of a cable to your MacBook and then to the screen. I’ve been wanting a screen extender for a hot minute now and am satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This add on monitor is just what I needed. Very easy to install and works right away without any need for setting changes. The picture is very clear. It folds up and comes with a carrying case, which is great because it won’t get damaged in my laptop bag. There is even a kick stand on the back of it to support the extra weight on the laptop. Very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really snug and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It is very thin and fits around my laptop pretty nice. Comes with all the cables you need and a carrying case!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes work so much easier!
reviews.reviewText: With this 12" laptop screen extender, I can now work properly and in a more functional way. I have an additional screen to move tabs to, and it connects in a second. It's small, so useful for specific things.
